sen.j: 永禄8年（1565年）5月1日、室町幕府第13代将軍・足利義輝から「義」の字を賜って義重と改名し、さらに義輝の奏請により左京大夫に任官された。
sen.e: On May 1, 1565, he was given a letter '義' from the name of the 13th Shogun Yoshiteru (義輝) ASHIKAGA and renamed himself Yoshishige (義重), and also was appointed to Sakyo-no-Daibu (the chief of the public office which supervised the east half of Kyoto) by Yoshiteru's suggestion to the Emperor.
